```{r, echo=F}

# Set dates
from_day <- as.Date("2023/09/1")
to_day <- as.Date("2024/01/31")
daylist <- seq(from_day, to_day, by="1 day")

days_to_highlight <- match(as.Date(c("2023/10/23", "2024/1/13")),
  daylist)



calendR::calendR(start_date = "2023/09/1", end_date = "2024/01/30", 
                 title = "2023/2024",
                 orientation = "portrait", 
                 start = "M",
                 mbg.col = 4,           # Background color for the month names
                 months.col = "white",  # Text color of the month names
                 special.days = days_to_highlight,
                 special.col = "pink", # Color of the special.days
                 months.pos = 0.5)     # Horizontal alignment of the month names)
```


```{r}
t <- calendR::calendR(year = 2021, month = 8, papersize = "A0")
```
